class battlenet_client.d3.client.D3Client(region: str, *, scope: Optional[List[str]] = None, redirect_uri: Optional[str] = None, client_id: Optional[str] = None, client_secret: Optional[str] = None)Â¶

Defines the client workflow class for Diablo III

Parameters

region (str) â region abbreviation for use with the s

Keyword Arguments

  • scope (list of str, optional) â the scope or scopes to use during the data that require the Web Application Flow

  • redirect_uri (str, optional) â the URI to return after a successful authentication between the user and Blizzard

  • client_id (str, optional) â the client ID from the developer portal

  • client_secret (str, optional) â the client secret from the developer portal
